page.title: 01GENERAL VIEW 1
page.content: The results of our land use survey showed that the block falls into two distinct areas _ the northern part of {YEOVIL}and the surrounding countryside,dotted with small villages. As a result,land cover is almost equally divided between Farmland and Housing.Most of the Farmland is grass,mainly for cattle grazing,with some arable crops and a big Fruit Farm.The small villages are attractive,with many Hamstone cottages,old Churches and Inns with more modern houses and bungalows on the outskirts.Few of the villages have a shop,few of the inhabitants are young and many of the primary schools have closed.Most adults drive to Yeovil for work and entertainment.
